data.fullContent: Bill loved to write, and he dabbled in poetry from time to time. When his creative writing teacher gave the class a poetry assignment, Bill was thrilled. His teacher asked him to write a poem about the first day of school. Bill knew just what to write about and was excited to share his poem with the class. He thought it was a great poem, but he wasn't sure the rest of the class would agree. When he read it in class, his classmates became completely silent. Everyone stared at him with their mouths open. When some of his fellow students finally spoke, they told Bill they were simply amazed at how good his poem was.

q1.translation: 比尔喜欢写作，并不时涉猎诗歌。当他的创意写作老师给全班布置诗歌作业时，比尔非常激动。
q1.front: Bill loved to write, and he dabbled in poetry from time to time. When his creative writing teacher gave the class a poetry assignment, Bill was thrilled.
q1.content: Bill loved to write, and he dabbled in poetry ____ time to ____. When his creative ____ teacher ____ the class a poetry assignment, Bill was thrilled.

q2.translation: 比尔喜欢写作，并不时涉猎诗歌。当他的创意写作老师给全班布置诗歌作业时，比尔非常激动。他的老师让他写一首关于开学第一天的诗。比尔知道该写些什么，也很高兴能和全班分享他的诗。他认为这是一首伟大的诗，但他不确定班上其他同学是否会同意。当他在课堂上读这篇文章时，他的同学完全沉默了。每个人都张大嘴巴盯着他看。当他的一些同学终于开口说话时，他们告诉比尔，他的诗这么好，他们只是感到惊讶。
q2.front: Bill loved to write, and he dabbled in poetry from time to time. When his creative writing teacher gave the class a poetry assignment, Bill was thrilled.
q2.middle: His teacher asked him to write a poem about the first day of school.
q2.ending: Bill knew just what to write about and was excited to share his poem with the class. He thought it was a great poem, but he wasn't sure the rest of the class would agree. When he read it in class, his classmates became completely silent. Everyone stared at him with their mouths open. When some of his fellow students finally spoke, they told Bill they were simply amazed at how good his poem was.

options.sentence: Bill had to write a short story as part of his English class.
Bill had won first prize for his poem in the citywide writing contest.
He knew his brother loved to read, so he had to write something funny.
His teacher asked him to write a poem about the first day of school.
